eo:bands.name: The name of the band (e.g., 'B01', 'B8', 'band2', 'red')
eo:bands.common_name: The name commonly used to refer to the band to make it easier to search for bands across instruments. See the list of accepted common names.
eo:bands.description: Description to fully explain the band. CommonMark 0.29 syntax MAY be used for rich text representation.
eo:bands.center_wavelength: The center wavelength of the band, in micrometers (μm).
eo:bands.full_width_half_max: Full width at half maximum (FWHM). The width of the band, as measured at half the maximum transmission, in micrometers (μm).
eo:bands.solar_illumination: The solar illumination of the band, as measured at half the maximum transmission, in W/m2/micrometers.
